page.title: 02Home life
page.content: Information from pupils at Thornham school PETS We found out that virtually everybody in our school has a pet.There are only two people who have no pets at all. Total number of pets The total of pets are 120 or more and there are only 20 pupils in our school.This is a list of names of pets,dogs,cats,goldfish,ducks,donkey, chickens and budgies. Household Safety In the last year the following accidents have occured to families in Thornham School.The first accidents happened to a seven year old infant.He got bitten by a dog near his eye,He had six stitches and had lots of scratches on his face.
